content: I think your article, in a wider perspective, just reminds me that integrity and authenticity seem to be the most difficult things for anyone in power in to hold onto and that, ultimately, we all need to take responsibility for ourselves and our communities with our integrity in tact. Human beings don’t seem to hold up under the temptation of positions of power over others very well so we need to stop elevating them to those positions. That’s just my two cents ;)
